trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie is ready to depart Ala Ghiri when you are.
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>We have a fair bit of ground to cover, so we should split up. If you come across any imperial soldiers, you know what to do.

TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>Oh, and so you know─I sent word to Arenvald's squadron. They are already searching other nearby areas, so we have allies in the event we encounter anything beyond our means.
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_200_020<tab>Say that again, if you would. ...Hmm. No, maintain your distance for now.
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_100_020<tab>...Understood. Keep me apprised of any developments.
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>That was Arenvald. The pair that was spying on us in the Fringes has followed us here...
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_023<tab>...And there I was thinking we might be due for some peace and quiet. Glad to hear you dealt with them.
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_024<tab>I hope the assault on Specula Imperatoris is going well...
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>By the Twelve, did you see that!? The main tower just collapsed!
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_026<tab>You heard it too, didn't you? It must have been the cannon at Castrum Abania. But that was an imperial installation, and their troops were still─
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_027<tab>Dammit, no one's responding! I don't know if the shell is being jammed or...
TEXT_STMBDA610_02536_ALISAIE_000_028<tab>We have to go right now! They need our help!
